snippet: A Michigan lawmaker who quit office amid a sex scandal in 2015 is expected to face trial this spring on a perjury charge....

headline.main: EU Nations Thrash Out Deal on Carbon Market Reform
headline.print_headline: EU Nations Thrash Out Deal on Carbon Market Reform

lead_paragraph: A Michigan lawmaker who quit office amid a sex scandal in 2015 is expected to face trial this spring on a perjury charge.
